Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Laramie
ShortDescription: EB 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Laramie, Washington, Cicero, and Madison due to, police activity near Madison/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Laramie, Washington, Cicero, and Madison due to, police activity near Madison/Laramie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
